name: Alchemic VR
description:
Have you ever wanted to become alchemic? 

Have own shop? 

Sell various potions?

If the answer is yes then alchemic vr might be just a game for you. 

Fulfill clients requests(and kick them if you can't do it or don't want to), earn money, gain ability to send adventurers into more dangerous places, gain more ingridients and have fun.

Notes:

This project is free.

Demo has no game saving.

 I think about adding ability to gather ingridients by yourself in the world.

I also want to add ability to make artifacts.
